page.title: 12Technology in N.W.Edinburgh
page.content: {Ferranti}is the largest science-based company in{Scotland.}It is known all over the world for{electronics.}Three of the twelve Scottish factories are in this area and they cover 48000 sq. metres of land in our Block. The firm employs{scientists, technicians, {engineers, craftsmen}and takes much of its labour force from the local community. The factories at Crewe Toll and Silverknowes produce{radar systems and{inertial navigation systems}for air craft such as Phantoms and Harrier as well as{"Ariane"}a vehicle used to launch satellites into space. {Defence products}for the army, navy and airforce make up two thirds of the company's business, but some of the products have been adapted for use in {commerce and industry.}The factory at Bellesk House, Granton makes{range {finders}and{remote control devices.
